links.text: Two economies collide: Competition, conflict, and the financial case for fossil fuel divestment
Unburnable Carbon – Are the world’s financial markets carrying a carbon bubble?
Unburnable Carbon 2013: Wasted capital and stranded assets

listItems: Reducing exposure to financial risks from the decline of the fossil fuel industry and the carbon bubble;
Being responsible financial stewards for the long-term health of both portfolios and the planet;
and, revoking support from fossil fuel companies and promoting a transition to a green energy future.

timeline.text: Beyond Coal started as a branch of the Sierra Club
Beyond Coal merged with Students for Environmental Concerns
86% of the student body voted to divest from coal
Student Senate passed a resolution to divest from coal
